name: Minor Nick
effect: The target suffers 1 strain.

name: Slowed Down
effect: Target can only act in the last allied initiative slot on their next turn/

name: Sudden Jolt
effect: The target drops whatever is in hand.

name: Distracted
effect: The target cannot perform a free maneuver during their next turn.

name: Off Balance
effect: Add :setback: to next skill check.

name: Discouraging Wound
effect: Flip one light side Destiny Point to the dark side. (Opposite if NPC)

name: Stunned
effect: Target is staggered until the end of their next turn.

name: Stinger
effect: Increase difficulty of next check by one.

name: Bowled Over
effect: Target is knocked prone and suffers 1 strain.

name: Head Ringer
effect: Target increases the difficulty of Cunning and Intellect checks by one until the end of the encounter.

name: Fearsome Wound
effect: Target increases the difficulty of Presence and Willpower checks by one until the end of the encounter.

name: Agonizing Wound
effect: Target increases the difficulty of Brawn and Agility checks by one until the end of the encounter.

name: Slightly Dazed
effect: Target is disoriented until the end of the encounter.

name: Scattered Senses
effect: Target removes :boost: from all skill checks until the end of the encounter.

name: Hamstrung
effect: Target loses their free maneuver until the end of the encounter.

name: Overpowered
effect: The target leaves themselves open, and the attacker may immediately attempt another free attack against them, using the exact same pool as the original attack.

name: Winded
effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target cannot suffer strain to activate any abilities or gain additional maneuvers.

name: Compromised
effect: Increasee the difficulty of all skill checks by one until the end of the encounter.

name: At the Brink
effect: Target suffers 1 strain each time they perform an action.

name: Crippled
effect: One of the target's limbs (selected by the GM) is crippled until healed or replaced. Increase the difficulty of all checks that require use of that limb by one.

name: Mained
effect: One of the target's limbs (selected by the GM) is permanently lost. Checks that require use of that limb cannot be performed. All other actions gain :setback:.

name: Horrific Injury
effect: Roll 1d10 to determine one of the target's characteristics. 1-3 for Brawn, 4-6 for Agility, 7 for Intellect, 8 for Cunning, 9 for Presence, 10 for Willpower. Until this Critical Injury is healed, treat that characteristic as one point lower.

name: Temporarily Lame
effect: Until this Critical Injury is healed, the target cannot perform more than one maneuver during their turn.

name: Blinded
effect: The target can no longer see. Upgrade the difficulty of all checks twice. Upgrade the difficulty of Perception and Vigilance checks three times.

name: Knocked Senseless
effect: The target is staggered for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Gruesome Injury
effect: Roll 1d10 to determine one of the target's characteristics. 1-3 for Brawn, 4-6 for Agility, 7 for Intellect, 8 for Cunning, 9 for Presence, 10 for Willpower. That characteristic is permanently reduced by one, to a minimum of one.

name: Bleeding Out
effect: Every round, the target suffers 1 wound and 1 strain at the beginning of their turn. For every five wounds they suffer beyond their wound threshold, they suffer one additional critical injury. (If this injury is suffered, roll again.)

name: The End is Nigh
effect: The target will die after the final initiative slot during the next turn.

name: Dead
effect: Complete, obliterated death.
